I am playing FSX. I am the pilot of a Boeing 737, World Travel Airlines flight 7050, Frankfurt, Germany to Barajas, Spain.
ok

4 hours ago, Ben J. Kerman said:

What mod is this?

Feline Utility Rovers for the body, Restock+ for the ice cream. You can use Feline Utility Rovers' wheels, but clip them in and up a bit. Just two things:

  1. I actually used Grounded wheels, even though they're the same diameter as FUR's wheels. I just didn't think of clipping the FUR wheels in back then because I was tired
  2. FUR wheels are node-attached
Edited May 21, 2021 by OrdinaryKerman

Ok, thanks!

Edited May 21, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman
Hello.

I think I am now flying over France. I am recording it and will make a YouTube video, but I need to keep stopping because I keep running out of space on the computer! The video is already up to over an hour now.

7 minutes ago, Ben J. Kerman said:

I think I am now flying over France. I am recording it and will make a YouTube video, but I need to keep stopping because I keep running out of space on the computer! The video is already up to over an hour now.

France! Nice!

Yeah! In FSX, of course. I have barely been out of New England, let alone Europe. I would like to go to Germany at some point in my life, maybe even work at Liebherr-Werk Ehingen GmbH. I need to learn German first; I'm not going to be one of those people that goes to a country without knowing the language first.
